metrics.name: clear_archive_after_days
metrics.description: Clears the archive after a set amount of days. Set to '0' to never clear. (DEFAULT=7)

metrics.name: keep_data_reports
metrics.description: When true, it keeps the data reports even after clear_archive_after_days is reached. (DEFAULT=TRUE)

metrics.name: interval
metrics.description: The frequency of when data points are recorded. WARNING: Do not go below 0.1 (DEFAULT=1)

archive.name: archive_GPU
archive.description: Decide whether or not to save GPU data to the archive. (DEFAULT=TRUE)

archive.name: archive_CPU
archive.description: Decide whether or not to save CPU data to the archive. (DEFAULT=TRUE)

archive.name: archive_RAM
archive.description: Decide whether or not to save RAM data to the archive. (DEFAULT=TRUE)

archive.name: archive_DISK
archive.description: Decide whether or not to save DISK data to the archive. (DEFAULT=TRUE)

archive.name: points_per_minute
archive.description: Amount of points to which data reports get reduced, per minute. (DEFAULT=10)

thresholds.name: threshold_GPU
thresholds.description: GPU Threshold percentage. Activates warning when exceeded. (DEFAULT=75)

thresholds.name: threshold_CPU
thresholds.description: CPU Threshold percentage. Activates warning when exceeded. (DEFAULT=75)

thresholds.name: threshold_RAM
thresholds.description: RAM Threshold percentage. Activates warning when exceeded. (DEFAULT=75)
